description: Notifies that a FLOGI is denied on an F port of the local device.

event.Summary: Login denied on port F of the local device

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmFPortDenyNotify IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginPWWN s EXAMPLEE HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginIntf i 9999 HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginTime t 31536000

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The pWWN of the device whose FLOGI(Fabric Login) request had
been denied. If the device is an n-node, the value of the instance
of hh3cFcPsmLoginSWWN should be zero-length string.
variables.name: HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginPWWN

description: The ifindex of the port where the login was denied.
variables.name: HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginIntf

description: Specifies the value of SysUpTime when the last denied login
happened.
variables.name: HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginTime

description: Notifies that a switch is denied on an E port of the local device.

event.Summary: Login denied on port E of the local device

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmEPortDenyNotify IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginSWWN s EXAMPLEE HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginIntf i 9999 HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginTime t 31536000

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The sWWN of the device whose FLOGI request had been denied.
If the device is a switch, the values of the instance of
hh3cFcPsmLoginPWWN and hh3cFcPsmLoginNWWN should be zero-length
string.
variables.name: HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginSWWN

description: The ifindex of the port where the login was denied.
variables.name: HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginIntf

description: Specifies the value of SysUpTime when the last denied login
happened.
variables.name: HH3C-FC-PSM-MIB::hh3cFcPsmLoginTime
